title: How-To: Search for URL Indicators of Compromise (IoC) Across a Data Set
description:
Explains how to search URL-based IOCs across HTTP logs, proxies, or other telemetry,
typically by inspecting URL or RequestURL fields and matching against an IOC list.

examples.name: Match URLs from IOC CSV
examples.description: Matches the normalized URL field against a list of known malicious URLs.
